{{disambig-more|adar|[[Adar (disambiguation)]]}}
'''''adar''''' is [[Sindarin]] for "father".<ref>{{PM|XNotes}}, p. 324</ref>

==Examples==
*''[[Ae Adar Nín|ae '''Adar''' nín i vi Menel]]'' = "our Father who art in Heaven"
*''[[Edenedair|'''Eden'''edair]]'' = "Fathers of Men"
*''[[Eladar|El'''adar''']]'' = "Starfather"
*''[[Iarwain Ben-adar|Iarwain Ben-'''adar''']]'' = "Oldest and Fatherless"

==Cognate==
*[[Quenya]] ''[[atar]]''
